data.title: The Fall Guy soundtrack: All the songs in Ryan Gosling movie
data.meta_description: The action comedy includes hits from Taylor Swift, AC/DC and Christina Aguilera.
data.text:
A brilliant cast led by two of this year's Oscars nominees, an ending featuring surprise cameos, some mind-boggling, record-breaking stunts and an epic soundtrack; these are just some of the gems you can expect from the season's blockbuster opener, The Fall Guy.

Advertisement

Ryan Gosling plays a retired stuntman roped back into the game to work on his ex-flame's (Emily Blunt) first feature. Director David Leitch and Gosling himself opened up about how their real-life experiences making movies inspired some key scenes.

"It was really fun to direct from a place of knowledge and experience," Leitch told RadioTimes.com. "You don't get to often do that as a director – you're, like, [usually] researching a world, you know, and trying to make it authentic. But this was as authentic as it could be."

Much like the cast – which also includes possible future James Bond Aaron Taylor-Johnson – the soundtrack features plenty of big names, including Taylor Swift, Journey and Christina Aguilera.

KISS's I Was Made for Lovin' You also features, as well as a cover of the song by YUNGBLUD.

More like this

Want to know more? Read on for the full list of songs featured in The Fall Guy soundtrack.

The Fall Guy soundtrack

You can find the full list of songs featured in the soundtrack for The Fall Guy below:

I Was Made for Lovin' You performed by KISS

Fiesta performed by Daniel Indart

Thunderstruck performed by AC/DC

All Too Well (Taylor's Version) performed by Taylor Swift

I Was Made for Lovin' You performed by YUNGBLUD

All I Do Is Win performed by DJ Khaled

Any Way You Want It performed by Journey

I Believe in a Thing Called Love performed by The Darkness

Genie in a Bottle performed by Christina Aguilera

Against All Odds (Take a Look at Me Now) performed by Phil Collins

The Fall Guy is now showing in UK cinemas.
